title: Active Data Studio 8.2.0
description:
Active Data Studio 8.2.0

Active@ Data Studio (Live CD) contains a set of both desktop applications 
and a bootable image for booting up any system into a DOS or Windows environment. 
Whether you need to perform data recovery, data imaging, or to securely erase data, 
Active@ Data Studio allows you to run the utilities from within Windows or to boot 
a system up from a self-contained boot environment.

Active@ Data Studio components:

Active@ File Recovery - Deleted data recovery software

Active@ Partition Recovery - Lost partition recovery software

Active@ UNDELETE - Recovers deleted files and restore deleted partitions

Active@ Password Changer - Windows password resetting tool

Active@ Disk Image - Imaged-based data backup and restoration tool

Active@ Virtual Disk - Mount disk backup to Windows. Explorer as virtual read-only disk.

Active@ KillDisk - Secure data erasure and disk wiping software

Active@ CD/DVD Data Burner - CD/DVD burning software

Active@ Disk Editor - Tool for editing disk in a binary format

Active@ Hard Disk Monitor - Freeware disk utility that checks and monitors 
the status of your hard drives to help prevent data loss.

PC Disk Partition Manager - Edit, format and manage the partitions in your computer

Documentation - User guides and documentation for all Active@ Data Studio products in PDF format


Active@ Boot Disk Components:

Network operations utilities:
Map Network Drive
Remote Desktop Connection
Web browser
FTP Client
Telnet Client
Network Configuration Utility

System Utilities:
Many of these utilities are familiar Windows functions. With Active@ Boot Disk, 
you can access them even if your hard drive is damaged.

Internet Utilities:
Active@ Web Surfer
Mail Sender
FTP Client
Telnet Client

Other Utilities:
File Explorer
Task Manager
On-Fly Drivers Loader
Display Configuration Utility
Notepad
Command Prompt shell

Cost $199
